|expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Arcadyan WN4403A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6063 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=DOCSIS 2.0 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=TI,SMC8014WG-TWCXX |default_ssid_regex=^TI$,,,^SMC8014WG-TWC[A-F0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=cusadmin |default_pass=password |oui=00:26:F3 |oui_eth=00:26:F3 |default_ch= }} [http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&cid=2&scid=19&localeCode=EN_USA&pid=1505 Product page]
[http://www.smc.com/files/AO/SMC8014W-G_UserManual.pdf User manual] SMC part number 752.9305NA The CPU is part TNETC4600ZDW. The wireless module has an '''Infineon''' PSB1350AZGU ('''TI''' TNETW1350A). "PCB NO. 3840011709N0 REV. 2A SMC-8014WG" is silkscreened on the board. While booting, the router appears to take on the SSID of '''TI'''. After booting, the default SSID is '''SMC8014WG-TWCXX''' where '''XX''' appears to be the last two hex digits of the RF MAC (which seems to be the WLAN MAC minus 2) on the label. ==Images== File:SMC SMC8014WG angled.jpg|angled File:SMC SMC8014WG front.jpg|front File:SMC SMC8014WG top.jpg|top File:SMC SMC8014WG bottom.jpg|bottom File:SMC SMC8014WG back.jpg|back File:SMC SMC8014WG power supply.jpg|power supply [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:SMC SMC8014WG board top.jpg|board top File:SMC SMC8014WG CPU.jpg|CPU File:SMC SMC8014WG Flash.jpg|Flash File:SMC SMC8014WG RAM.jpg|RAM File:SMC SMC8014WG Switch.jpg|Switch File:SMC SMC8014WG board ID.jpg|board ID File:SMC SMC8014WG board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
